faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about Bookly

q1.question: How long does setup take?
q1.answer: Full system setup takes only 10-15 minutes. We provide step-by-step instructions with pictures.

q2.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
q2.answer: No! Our system is designed for regular users. All actions are intuitive.

q3.question: Can I use it on mobile?
q3.answer: Yes! We have a responsive admin panel and Telegram Web App for mobile management.

q4.question: Are there client limits?
q4.answer: Free plan includes up to 50 appointments per month. Paid plans have virtually no limits.

q5.question: Can I integrate with other systems?
q5.answer: Yes, we have API for integration with CRM, calendars, and other systems.
